## Checklist
<!-- Ensure all items are completed before submitting -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] SwiftLint passes without warnings
- [ ] No force unwrapping in production code (except where explicitly justified)
- [ ] No print statements (using Logger instead)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this on a physical device (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation files
- [ ] I have added inline documentation for new public APIs
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR includes breaking changes
- [ ] I have documented all breaking changes
- [ ] I have updated the migration guide (if applicable)
